course.subject: ECON
course.name: Microeconomic Theory I
course.description: Theory of the firm, theory of consumer behavior, duality; theory of the market, game theory; neoclassical and alternative approaches.

reviews.author: wen moon ser
reviews.comment_content:
如果你係ug學生而打算讀mphil/phd econ嘅話，可以考慮讀呢個course去幫自己準備下，同時睇下自己夠唔夠料。一個UG學生想reg呢個course可以喺registration之前連埋transcript send email俾prof 問。如果佢覺得你夠料就會俾你讀。

如果你想讀呢個course嘅話，以下嘅知識係我認為你一定要具備同埋掌握（分先後次序）：
1. Real Analysis
2. Multivariable Calculus
3. Linear Algebra
4. Probability Theory
5. Basic Microeconomic Theory

呢一個course主要就係用一啲Axioms開始用數學同logic去推一啲intuitive嘅economic theory，例如law of demand/ law of supply。之後再進一步rigorously推一啲唔intuitive嘅result，例如roy's identity之類。成個course係比較abstract同rigorous，就算係講application都會係好mathematical同theoretical，好少真係講empirical嘅case同application。呢個course主要係一個framework俾學生去做research嘅時候follow。呢個course主要分做三parts，demand theory、firm theory同埋game theory。原本suppose要教埋market theory，但時間唔夠就無教到，用UG嘅course做比較嘅話就係3113+3133+4124嘅advanced版，教嘅野會比較classical。

Course Content:
1. Demand Theory:
  1.1. Preference
  1.2. Choice and choice-based demand
  1.3. Utility and preference-based demand
  1.4. Utility maximization
  1.5. Expenditure minimization and duality
  1.6. Extra results about demand
---------------------Midterm----------------------
  1.7. Choice under uncertainty

2. Firm Theory:   
  2.1. Production technology
  2.2. Profit maximization and cost minimization
  2.3. Extra results about supply

3. Game Theory:
  3.1. Game setup and notation
  3.2. Simultaneous game and rationalizable strategy
  3.3. Nash equilibrium and correlated equilibrium
  3.4. Dynamic game and sequential rationality
  3.5. Subgame perfect equilibrium
  3.6. Bargaining game
  3.7. Incomplete information game and perfect Bayesian equilibrium
reviews.comment_teaching:
Kawaguchi 係日本人，佢嘅accent會相對地比較重同埋難明少少。但係佢係極之熱心去教明你。你有任何問題都可以上堂問佢問題/去佢office hour/用slack問佢。佢都會盡力答你嘅問題。但呢個course嘅schedule真係好tight同埋好深下，所以佢有時難免都會講到一舊舊，咁就將就下，最好每堂完左之後review返。

呢個course嘅content主要係用返"Microeconomic Theory", Mas-Collel, A., M.D. Whinston, and J.R. Green, Oxford, 1995 。呢本書喺圖書館都幾搶手但又好必要。網上會有pdf，但如果你係嗰啲一定要用實體書嘅人，最好一早上網買返本。至於點樣寫proof，prof.會recommend你去睇baby rudin學，呢個就見仁見智。

上堂都會以prove返啲classical result為主，pure math 嘅theory就只會略略講下點樣嚟，例如hyperplane separating theorem、Kuhn tucker theorem之類。同埋會講少少classical 嘅application同example，例如insurance、cournot model之類。
reviews.comment_grading:
PG course就好似B-先算pass嘅，所以一定係比較靚grade的。一個midterm，一個final同7份assignment。考試就會係computational question比較多，少少proof。但係一啲都唔易，因為好多時都幾tedious，我考試考到唔想計落去。佢話就話final係cumulative，但考落其實無考midterm前嘅野。

Grading Scheme:
Assignment 20%
Midterm 30%
Final 50%

General Performance:
Assignment: 70/70
Midterm: 34.6/70
Final: 41.9/80

My Performance:
Assignment: 70/70
Midterm: 49/70
Final: 46/80

Final Grade: A
reviews.comment_workload: Workload係極重，一嚟呢個course有極多內容同埋啲野極深奧，要Spend好多時間去理解同埋review。另外呢個course有assignment，係Mas-Collel嘅exercise同埋一啲tutor set 嘅extra question，全部都require好多嘅思考同理解先寫得到個solution，一份都有幾多題下，我諗大概都要兩三日不停做先做得完一份，所以如果你打算讀就唔好同時reg太多科，因為呢科會佔左你幾多時間下。
